author: Maia Davis
title: 'Hello in there': John Prine still 'very ill' in ICU
description: 'Hello in there': John Prine still 'very ill' in ICU with pneumonia in both lungs
content:
John Prine performs at John Anson Ford Amphitheatre on Oct. 1, 2019 in Hollywood, Calif.Rich Fury / Getty Images file
Singer-songwriter John Prine remains 'very ill' in intensive care with pneumonia in both lungs, his wife said in an update on the influentia… [+7305 chars]
